definition: A person who has legal ownership or possession of something, often referring to tangible objects or property. This term is commonly used to describe individuals who hold the title or control over a particular item, such as a house, car, or business.

examples.german: Der Besitzer des Hauses ist sehr freundlich.
examples.english: The owner of the house is very friendly.

examples.german: Der Besitzer des Restaurants hat das Menü geändert.
examples.english: The owner of the restaurant has changed the menu.

examples.german: Der Besitzer des Autos hat einen Unfall gehabt.
examples.english: The owner of the car had an accident.

examples.german: Der Besitzer des Geschäfts ist im Urlaub.
examples.english: The owner of the store is on vacation.

examples.german: Der Besitzer des Hundes hat ihn gut erzogen.
examples.english: The owner of the dog has trained him well.
